summary: The diff adds/extends in-app deployment diagnostics, runtime env.json status inspection, readiness evaluation, and a publishing checklist doc. It does not (and likely cannot, from code changes alone) perform the actual Caffeine-editor publish or guarantee production /env.json injection. The diff also includes multiple unrelated UI/quiz/theme changes not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the current draft build to the live (production) deployment using the Caffeine editor publish flow (the app cannot self-publish). Ensure the publish process injects a real backend canister ID into the live /env.json so CANISTER_ID_BACKEND is not the placeholder value PLACEHOLDER_BACKEND_CANISTER_ID.
missing_requirements.reason: No code diff can demonstrate that a production publish was executed via the Caffeine editor, nor that the live deployment’s served /env.json was injected with a real canister ID. The changes are limited to frontend diagnostics/docs that instruct publishing rather than performing it.

hallucinated_features.description: Major quiz/editor feature additions and changes (e.g., ‘Study Article’ textarea field per question, draft persistence, image upload support, export, backup/restore, question block management).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states non-goal: no new product features/UI changes unrelated to publishing; these changes are unrelated to publishing/verification.

hallucinated_features.description: Adaptive learning scheduler/session logic changes (mastery-based repeats, spacing rules, randomized order, new counters).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to publishing or deployment diagnostics.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/CSS and Tailwind aesthetic changes (cyber-bunker OKLCH color system updates, font/shadow utilities).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to publish flow or canister ID injection verification.
Not requested; unrelated to publishing/diagnostics requirements.
